snippet: Rickie Lee Fowler, 30, intentionally set a fire in Waterman Canyon in the foothills above San Bernardino which burned 91,000 acres and 1,000 homes.
abstract: Rickie Lee Fowler is convicted of murder in the deaths of five men caused by a fire he intentionally set in 2003 in Waterman Canyon in the foothills above San Bernardino, California.
lead_paragraph: Rickie Lee Fowler, 30, intentionally set a fire in Waterman Canyon in the foothills above San Bernardino which burned 91,000 acres and 1,000 homes.

headline.main: California: Man Convicted of Murder in Five Deaths From 2003 Wildfire
headline.print_headline: California: Man Convicted of Murder In Five Deaths From 2003 Wildfire
